name: NIST Risk Management Framework
description: NIST Special Publication 800-37 Revision 2 - Risk Management Framework for Information Systems and Organizations

controls.title: Access Control Policy and Procedures
controls.description: The organization develops, documents, and disseminates access control policy and procedures
controls.implementationGuidance: Develop comprehensive access control policies and procedures that define user access rights and restrictions based on business requirements and security considerations.

controls.title: Account Management
controls.description: The organization manages information system accounts
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement comprehensive account management procedures to ensure proper creation, modification, suspension, and termination of user accounts.

controls.title: Access Enforcement
controls.description: The information system enforces approved authorizations for logical access to information and system resources
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement technical controls to enforce approved authorizations and ensure only authorized users can access information and system resources.

controls.title: Information Flow Enforcement
controls.description: The information system enforces approved authorizations for controlling the flow of information
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement controls to enforce approved information flow policies and prevent unauthorized information disclosure or modification.

controls.title: Separation of Duties
controls.description: The organization separates duties of individuals as necessary
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement separation of duties to prevent conflicts of interest and reduce the risk of fraud, error, or unauthorized access.

controls.title: Least Privilege
controls.description: The organization employs the principle of least privilege
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement the principle of least privilege to ensure users have only the minimum access necessary to perform their job functions.

controls.title: Unsuccessful Logon Attempts
controls.description: The information system enforces a limit of consecutive invalid logon attempts
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement controls to limit consecutive unsuccessful logon attempts and automatically lock accounts after exceeding the threshold.

controls.title: System Use Notification
controls.description: The information system displays an approved system use notification message
controls.implementationGuidance: Display approved system use notification messages to inform users of their responsibilities and legal obligations when accessing the system.

controls.title: Previous Logon Notification
controls.description: The information system notifies the user of successful logons
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement notifications to inform users of successful logons, including previous logon information for security awareness.

controls.title: Concurrent Session Control
controls.description: The information system limits the number of concurrent sessions
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement controls to limit the number of concurrent sessions per user to prevent unauthorized access and resource abuse.

controls.title: Session Lock
controls.description: The information system prevents further access to the system by initiating a session lock
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement session lock mechanisms to prevent unauthorized access when users are away from their workstations.

controls.title: Session Termination
controls.description: The information system automatically terminates a user session
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement automatic session termination based on defined conditions to ensure security and resource management.

controls.title: Supervision and Review
controls.description: The organization supervises and reviews user activities
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement comprehensive supervision and review processes to monitor user activities and ensure compliance with security policies.

controls.title: Permitted Actions Without Identification or Authentication
controls.description: The organization identifies and documents permitted actions
controls.implementationGuidance: Identify and document actions that are permitted without identification or authentication, ensuring they are limited and justified.

controls.title: Remote Access
controls.description: The organization authorizes, monitors, and controls remote access
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement comprehensive controls for remote access including authorization, monitoring, and control mechanisms to ensure security.

publisher: National Institute of Standards and Technology
